text:
hi all. new to HubSpot forms api. im wanting to build custom data capture form using custom html, js, css ideally i want to use next.js. then have the form data on submit post to HubSpot form api.

my custom html, js, css or next.js framework i use. can i upload this onto HubSpot form to host? thanks for your help!

HiÂ <@U02BUAY64D9>

As I know, HubSpot does not provide to upload your own Form in HS or host on HS but, you can have a similar Form in HS and on your external website. Later, you can post the details to the HS form via this API
<https://legacydocs.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/forms/submit_form>.

Has anyone used wow.js for animations in modules? I'm having some trouble getting my elements to animate. Would appreciate any help!

I have this in my module.html

`<link rel="stylesheet" href="<https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/animate.css/4.1.1/animate.min.css>"/>`
`<script src="<https://cdnjs.cloudflare.com/ajax/libs/wow/1.1.2/wow.min.js>"></script>`
`<script>`
  `new WOW().init();`
`</script>`

And giving the element (example) class

`<div class="left-content wow slideInLeft" data-wow-delay="5s">` 

Doesn't work with our without the data-wow-delay

Will you please try after adding this one?
```    <script src="<https://ajax.googleapis.com/ajax/libs/jquery/1.11.3/jquery.min.js>"></script>```
